title: MorphSensor: An Electronic Design Tool for Reforming Sensor Modules.
authors: Junyi Zhu, Yunyi Zhu, Jiaming Cui, Leon Cheng, Jackson C Snowden, Mark Chounlakone, Michael Wessely, Stefanie Mueller.
description: We present a system that allows users to break down sensor modules into components and rearrange the pieces according to product's geometry, which better integrate with the three-dimensional shape of a physical prototype.

title: CurveBoards: Integrating Breadboards into Physical Objects to Prototype Function in the Context of Form.
authors: Junyi Zhu, Lotta-Gili Blumberg, Yunyi Zhu, Martin Nisser, Ethan Levi Carlson, Xin Wen, Kevin Shum, Jessica Ayeley Quaye, Stefanie Mueller.
description: CurveBoards are breadboards integrated into physical objects. In contrast to traditional breadboards, CurveBoards better preserve the objectâ€™s look and feel while maintaining high circuit fluidity, which enables designers to exchange and reposition components during design iteration.
